Journal Story: Hiked the Marshall Swamp Trail here in Ocala, Florida. Getting some time in with a packed pack and trying out the Jetboil cooking system.   I got 7 miles in. Great trail. The Jetboil was amazing. Heats up fast. I will try to add a picture.
Another hike with my backpack. Quite warm-over 80°. Found som native orange trees and believe me they tasted so good on a hot day. Only got about 5 miles in.

So I ordered a pair of Altras Lone Peak 6 to try them out. They are awesome. I love the wide toe box. They are super light and comfortable. I also own some Oboz that I also love. Considering wearing the Oboz for the first couple of states and then switching to the Altras in Virginia.
